typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy']) ~> source1
Select1 derive({Date/Time} = toDate({Date/Time}, 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> TestDate
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Date/Time},
		{Data Type},
		{Data Value}
	)) ~> Select1
TestDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> sink1
